body_html:
Would this be as simple as including both possible directories here (and lines below and above, all the environment variables we use to point to cuda library locations)

tensorflow/tensorflow/tools/docker/Dockerfile.devel-gpu

Line 91 in 4addf4b

ENV LD_LIBRARY_PATH /usr/local/cuda/lib64:/usr/local/cuda/extras/CUPTI/lib64

body:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/4addf4b5806cd731949c6582a83f5824599cd1ef/tensorflow/tools/docker/Dockerfile.devel-gpu#L91
